game_name: Puzzling Places - Patreon Legacy Support Version
game_description: THIS IS NOT THE MAIN PUZZLING PLACES APP! Please check the regular Quest store for that. This version of the app DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY PUZZLES! It is solely intended to enable former Patreons to play the test puzzles that were released as part of the pre launch Patreon campaign as these are no longer supported by the main app. The Patreon test puzzles were exclusive for Patreon supporters and cannot be purchased anymore. In order to install puzzles, please download and start the app once, then connect it to the computer and copy your existing Patreon puzzles to the following folder: \Quest 2\Internal Storage\Android\obb\com.RealitiesIO.puzzlingPlacesPatreonLSV
review_1: Its for early supporters. Base game version 1.5 here (lower version, older engine). Its for whom donated money and has early beta maps to be ableto play with. Thank you devs. Hope to see beta maps again in base game too.
review_2: You can't play without this previous game you purchased on your PC!
